body.name: Pipishell Bookshelf, 6-Tier Bookcase with Storage Drawer, Tall Bookshelf Storage Rack with Metal Frame & Wood Grain Finish, Industrial Bookshelf for Living Room, Bedroom, and Home Office, PIBS02B
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 27 mins
features: MAXIMUM STURDINESS: The Pipishell bookshelf is both beautiful and sturdy. The reinforced metal frame and 0.6" thick engineered wood boards support up to 300 lbs (50 lbs per shelf). X-shaped support bars attached to the back enhance stability.

6 TIER SHELVES WITH DRAWER: With 6 tier shelves, this bookcase provides plenty of storage to display books, photos, decorations, plants, collectibles, and more. The tall bookshelf features a storage drawer for toys, towels, or other items.

ADD CHARM & CHARACTER: The 6-tier bookshelf is designed with a combination of industrial elements and subtle style to blend in well with any home décor. The clean & modern look can add a unique charm and character to your living room, bedroom, home office, and more.

DESIGNED FOR STORAGE: The industrial bookshelf has raised shelf edges on the sides and back to keep your books and photos in place and prevent them falling. The anti-tip anchor kit secures the storage rack to the wall. Adjustable feet stabilize the bookshelf on uneven flooring.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: The standing bookshelf includes standard hardware and detailed instructions for hassle-free assembly. Please reach out to our US-based product support team if you have any questions about assembly or choosing a product.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell 6-Tier Bookcase | Organize Your Living Space Need more storage for your collectibles and books? The Pipishell 6-tier bookshelf is exactly what you need. The 6 spacious shelves are ideal for storing books, picture frames, collectibles, and more. The strong steel frame with thick engineered wood boards ensures stability for your things.

Previous page More space for your toys,towels, and other things Panels keep your books, photos, and knickknacks on the bookshelf Anchors the bookshelf to the wall for extra peace of mind Keep the bookshelf stable on uneven floors Keep the bookshelf stable on uneven floors Next page 1 Storage Drawer 2 Secure Edge Design 3 Anti-Tip Kit 4 Adjustable Feet
Add Character to Your Living Space
Stylish Storage Solution for Your Kitchen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would Recommend this to anybody
reviews.reviewText: This shelf is sturdy and doesn't have any "cheap" look to it. The metal and paint are well done. Very versatile design, could be used in most rooms in the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It wasn't super cheap or super expensive. For the price it does the job well. Instructions were simple. And correct. Not bad on quality. The only thing I noticed when putting it together was some of the screw holes were very close to the edge causing a slight bubble if you put the screw in too far. It is on the back side though.My only markdown on rating would be that the bottom drawer appeared to be an all wood drawer. It was actually a faux wood panel on a canvas drawer. I'm sure that was stated somewhere in the description that I didn't read in detail. Actually works better in a way, because you can remove it as it just sits atop the bottom shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble | Perfect Measurements
reviews.reviewText: The product description is 100% correct with the measurements. I assembled this shelf in 2.5 hours, and the .5 hours was mostly me goofing off and watching television. It was incredibly easy to assemble. It's sturdy but lightweight enough to move by one person and it holds over 20 pounds of items. The color of the wood in the product image is accurate as well, so for anyone looking to match the wood to another piece of furniture you own or are looking to get, the photo is accurate! I really like this new addition to my office corner. For the price, I'd say it was 100% worth it, given that it comes with a basket/drawer at the bottom that you can place on any of the shelves interchangeably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product was exactly what I was looking for. Received it really quickly and was pleased with the quality, easy instructions for assembly and how it fitted perfectly in my chosen area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with the shelf. It’s a great size and very sturdy! The drawer is a bit odd being mainly cloth but I’m used to it now! You just cannot overfill it!

reviews.reviewerName: Sleepy Blind Slim Boy Muddy WolfSleepy Blind Slim Boy Muddy Wolf
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Top “Drawer” but Very Good
reviews.reviewText: This shelf unit is easy to assemble & quite sturdy for being light in weight. The manufactured wood shelves look good, not fake. They say it will hold 50 lbs so, thats loads of books or, 𝙩𝙘𝙝𝙤𝙩𝙘𝙝𝙠𝙚𝙨. I really like the industrial look of the dark “wood” & metal frame. Essentially, I am very satisfied in almost all respects. One note. The “drawer” is a flimsy one-piece thing with a wood front & fabric sides . It won’t hold a heavy load. However, since it just rests inside the shelf without a track, you can omit it if you like.Otherwise, this is great for those tight spots & corners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice Bookshelf!
reviews.reviewText: Super great bookshelf! Slight chip on the bottom drawer fake wood cover, but it’s barely noticeable. 10/10 would recommend if looking for a cheaper option.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
